speaker: Presented by F. Michael Watson
title: Statistical Report 1993
body: For the information of the members of the Church, the First Presidency has issued the following statistical report concerning the growth and status of the Church as of 31 December 1993. The statistics are based on 1993 reports available prior to this conference.
